STYLE YOUR PILE
Style Your Pile is about, your life. Keeping your home organized and clean adds to a more productive, energized, and stress free life style. Opening up room for more enjoyment, and things that really count.

“By removing the mess you remove the stress”

I can help you start your new clean and organized style in all aspects of your life. Discover that the more clean and organized you are the more you will feel energized and able to do anything.

I can help you, STYLE YOUR PILE

I provide a free in home assessment. I will map out your exact needs, and time frame. As well, provide ease and informed tools though out the process.

Affordable cleaning and organizing

Please call, or email:

Brittany Daniher
705-329-8695
styleyourpile@bell.net
